data.title: Queenship in the Later Middle Ages, c. 1350-ca. 1500
data.meta_description: Adams, Tracy, “L’Affaire de la Tour de Nesle: Love Affair as Political Conspiracy,” in C. Leveleux-Teixeira, Ribémont B (eds.) Le crime de l'ombre. Paris: Klincksieck, 2010. 17–40. Adams, Tracy. “Anne de France and Gift-Giving: The Exercise of Female Power.”  In Susan Broomhall, (ed.), Women, Power, and Authority at the French Court, 1483–1563. Amsterdam: Amsterdam University Press,…
